1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Lexical relmap.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap.Lexmap
6  ( -- * Data types
7    Lexmap (..),
8    LexmapType (..),
9    RopName,
10
11    -- * Functions
12    lexName, lexLocalRef,
13    lexAddMessage,
14    lexMessageList,
15    lexAttrTree,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture     as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base         as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax       as S
21
22-- | Intermediate data that represents use of relmap operator.
23--   Lexmap is constructed from a list of 'B.TTree',
24--   and generic relmap is constructed from a lexmap.
25data Lexmap = Lexmap
26    { lexType      :: LexmapType    -- ^ Type of lexmap
27    , lexToken     :: S.Token       -- ^ Token of operator
28    , lexAttr      :: S.AttrPara    -- ^ Attribute of relmap operation
29    , lexSubmap    :: [(String, Lexmap)]   -- ^ Submaps in the attribute
30    , lexMessage   :: [String]      -- ^ Messages on lexmap
31    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
32
33-- | Type of lexmap.
34data LexmapType
35    = LexmapBase      -- ^ Relmap of built-in operator
36    | LexmapDerived   -- ^ Derived or user-defined relmap
37    | LexmapLocal     -- ^ Local relation reference like @^/r@ or @^r@
38      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
39
40instance B.GetCodePos Lexmap where
41    getCPs = B.getCPs . lexToken
42
43-- | Empty base lexmap.
44instance B.Default Lexmap where
45    def = Lexmap { lexType     = LexmapBase
46                 , lexToken    = S.rawTextToken ""
47                 , lexAttr     = B.def
48                 , lexSubmap   = []
49                 , lexMessage  = [] }
50
51-- | Name of relmap operator.
52type RopName = String
53
54-- | Attribute of relmap operation.
55lexAttrTree :: Lexmap -> [S.AttrTree]
56lexAttrTree = map (B.mapSnd head) . S.paraNameList . lexAttr
57
58-- | Name of relmap operator
59lexName :: Lexmap -> RopName
60lexName = S.tokenContent . lexToken
61
62-- | Lexmap local reference.
63lexLocalRef :: Lexmap -> Maybe S.LocalRef
64lexLocalRef lx = case lexToken lx of
65                   S.TLocal _ ref _ _ -> Just ref
66                   _                  -> Nothing
67
68-- | Add message to lexmap.
69lexAddMessage :: String -> O.Map Lexmap
70lexAddMessage msg lx = lx { lexMessage = msg : lexMessage lx }
71
72-- | Get message list from lexmap.
73lexMessageList :: Lexmap -> [String]
74lexMessageList Lexmap { lexToken = tok, lexMessage = msg }
75    | null msg  = []
76    | otherwise = msg ++ src
77    where src = map (("  " ++) . fst) $ B.cpMessageLines (cp, "")
78          cp  = head $ B.getCPs tok
79
